scripts.// 1: Run both builds and make a directory to extract the current npm package
scripts.prebuild:compare: yarn build:gulp && yarn build:bazel && rm -rf build/current-pkg && mkdir -p build/current-pkg
scripts.// 2: This command assumes you have installed the meld tool to have graphical diff
scripts.build:compare: npm pack | xargs tar -xvz -C build/current-pkg -f && meld build/current-pkg/package build/bin/npm_package
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run promisetest && npm run test:single && npm run test-node
scripts.karma-jasmine:autoclose: npm run karma-jasmine:single && npm run ws-client
scripts.test: npm run tsc && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run ws-server" "npm run karma-jasmine"
scripts.test:es2015: npm run tsc && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run ws-server" "npm run karma-jasmine:es2015"
scripts.test:single: npm run tsc && concurrently "npm run ws-server" "npm run karma-jasmine:autoclose"
scripts.test-dist: concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run ws-server" "karma start karma-dist-jasmine.conf.js"
scripts.test-mocha: npm run tsc && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run ws-server" "karma start karma-build-mocha.conf.js"
scripts.bazel:format: find . -type f \( -name "*.bzl" -or -name WORKSPACE -or -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "*/node_modules/*" ! -path "./build/*" | xargs buildifier -v --warnings=attr-cfg,attr-license,attr-non-empty,attr-output-default,attr-single-file,constant-glob,ctx-actions,ctx-args,depset-iteration,depset-union,dict-concatenation,duplicated-name,filetype,git-repository,http-archive,integer-division,load,load-on-top,native-build,native-package,out-of-order-load,output-group,package-name,package-on-top,positional-args,redefined-variable,repository-name,same-origin-load,string-iteration,unsorted-dict-items,unused-variable
